mapper.insert:
insert into resource_lb ( id, shape, xianju, xiangzhenchang, xingzhengcun, linbanhao, keyWord, suoshuxian, gongnengqu, mianji, maxX, maxY, minX, minY ) values
( #{item.id}, GeomFromText(#{item.shape}), #{item.xianju}, #{item.xiangzhenchang}, #{item.xingzhengcun}, #{item.linbanhao}, #{item.keyWord}, #{item.suoshuxian}, #{item.gongnengqu}, #{item.mianji}, #{item.maxX}, #{item.maxY}, #{item.minX}, #{item.minY} )

insert into resource_lb ( id, shape, xianju, xiangzhenchang, xingzhengcun, linbanhao, keyWord, suoshuxian, gongnengqu, mianji, maxX, maxY, minX, minY ) VALUES ( #{item.id}, GeomFromText(#{item.shape}), #{item.xianju}, #{item.xiangzhenchang}, #{item.xingzhengcun}, #{item.linbanhao}, #{item.keyWord}, #{item.suoshuxian}, #{item.gongnengqu}, #{item.mianji}, #{item.maxX}, #{item.maxY}, #{item.minX}, #{item.minY} )
